name: waatablenode
description: Web Audio node for reading a mono sample, and controlling the play position from an AudioParam

scripts.tests.init: node node_modules/waatest/bin/scaffold waatest; npm run tests.build
scripts.tests.build: browserify index.js > waatest/lib-build.js ; browserify test/index.js > waatest/test-build.js
